item.title: UALog
item.description: Challenge description Challenge Solution package com.firstapp.register; import java.io.IOException; import javax.servlet.ServletException; import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse; import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager; import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger; @WebServlet("/log") public class doLog extends HttpServlet { private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L; // using log4j library 2.14.0 for logging private static final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(log4shell.class); protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException { String userAgent = request.getHeader("User-Agent"); logger.error("User-Agent: " + userAgent); } } Solution steps or description
